Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Hmm this is a structured business process analysis request with clear instructions The user wants a breakdown of the pseudo-BPMN diagram focusing on step purposes gateway logic path convergence and conditional triggers

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The process has two main parallel tracks standard vs custom that later merge so I should explain both branches separately before discussing their convergence The approval gateway and rework loop are critical path elements that need special attention

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Ill organize the response by first summarizing the overall process purpose then decomposing it into phases initial request handling parallel processing paths approval logic and final steps For gateways Ill clarify XOR vs AND semantics explicitly since thats foundational to understanding flow The rework loop mechanics require careful explanation of how it maps back to different tasks based on request type

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: The explanation should maintain technical accuracy while being accessible to someone who may not be a BPMN expert Ill avoid diving into unrelated BPMN syntax details unless they directly impact process logic
